data.name: Wake World
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Wake World is a Multiplayer Coop, Open World RPG that takes place hundreds of years after a mysterious calamity, flooding the entire world leaving only islands in it's "wake"!

Adventure awaits you!

Explore the new world alone or with your friends, Wake World is all about discovery where you can Sail, Fight, Cook, Glide, Farm, Help villagers and so much more. Hop between islands where you will find everything from villagers to stinky radioactive spiders. Find the six artifacts which will put a stop to the endless onslaught on humanity or don't! That's right you are free to do what ever you want in this world, you could even become a pirate if you want! Maybe become a master cook? Or maybe you just want to buy as many horses and pets as your ship can hold :) The Karma spell system allows the people of Wake World to control elements of their choice whether it's Fire, Water, Earth, Lightning, Wind or Malice one can always become more powerful...

Your Ship Is Your Home

The main method of getting between islands is going to be your Steamship. You can even let go of the steer while you man the cannons or repair but of course it would be best to have your mates do it while you keep the ship on course. Customize your ship! Replace the old cannon's with shiny new blasters or replace rotten wood hull with gold plating, but the outside is not the only thing you can customize, Change the wallpaper or buy that super expensive king sized bed. Fully customize your character with very detailed level's of adjustments, so you can look how you want!

The Quest in Question

Shipwrecked, the traveler is taken in by the village, constantly under attack by the monsters a rumor is that it can be stopped but only someone sensitive to Karma spells is fit to venture out to the world on a quest to collect the six artifacts. There are no classes and no fixed paths, collect the artifacts in whatever order, that is if you want to save the villagers...The ocean is filled with mutated monsters and humans, treasure, old world remnants and many islands that have yet to be touched by human hands. Fully playable from start to end with your crew of choice.

data.short_description: Explore the new world with your friends in the world of wakes. Fight off hordes of skeletons and fight pirates on the open seas the choice is yours! Discover new islands, master spells, craft a new rifle or help out the villagers of Wake World in this Multiplayer, Open World, Action RPG.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: FX 4300 | i7 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 | RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A potato
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 | RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stronger potato
